content: add a touch of frill to your sampler afghan with gwendolyn free on everytrickonthehook com 1 gwendolyn is part of the 2019 block-a-week crochet along with julie anny 2 <hr> visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 3 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 4 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 5 visiting polly s place on ravelry 6 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 7 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 8 1 http //everytrickonthehook com/patterns-2/gwendolyn/ 2 http //julieyeagerdesigns com/ 3 everytrickonthehook com 4 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 5 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 6 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 7 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 8 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
